com.mopub.nativeads

Class MoPubNativeAdRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mopub.nativeads.MoPubNativeAdRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoPubAdRenderer<NativeResponse>

    public class MoPubNativeAdRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoPubAdRenderer<NativeResponse>
    An implementation of MoPubAdRenderer for rendering native ads.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MoPubNativeAdRenderer(ViewBinder viewBinder)
      Constructs a native ad renderer with a view binder.

    • Method Detail

      • createAdView

        public android.view.View createAdView(android.content.Context context,
                                      android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Description copied from interface: MoPubAdRenderer
        Creates a new view to be used as an ad. This method is called when you call MoPubStreamAdPlacer.getAdView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup) when the convertView is null. You must return a valid view.
        Specified by:
        createAdView in interface MoPubAdRenderer<NativeResponse>
        Parameters:
        context - The context. Useful for creating a view.
        parent - The parent that the view will eventually be attached to. You might use the parent to determine layout parameters, but should return the view without attaching it to the parent.
        Returns:
        A new ad view.

      • renderAdView

        public void renderAdView(android.view.View view,
                         NativeResponse nativeResponse)
        Description copied from interface: MoPubAdRenderer
        Renders a view created by MoPubAdRenderer.createAdView(android.content.Context, android.view.ViewGroup) by filling it with ad data.
        Specified by:
        renderAdView in interface MoPubAdRenderer<NativeResponse>
        Parameters:
        view - The ad View
        nativeResponse - The ad data that should be bound to the view.
